column4: Quick question: Anyone know how long I should give a LiveCD to boot before considering it a lost cause? It's a slightly older machine....
Par: I used an installer for windows that made a virtural file system under windows, but that install froze on "Installing software - WVDIAL"....
Par: I guess I'll try that. I've tried ubuntu on 5 of my laptops and none worked...however booted fine on a newer laptop from work....so...
older versions might work on them
